front.title: RBridges: More Proposed TRILL Header Options

abstract.t: The TRILL base protocol standard, draft-ietf-trill-rbridge- protocol-16.txt, specifies minimal hooks for options and draft-ietf- trill-rbridge-options specifies the format for options and a proposed initial set of options. This draft is a holding location for additional proposed options. It is not intended that this draft will ever progress to be an RFC.
